A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Worst Star Wars film...EVER. Adam Driver was sensational in this film with his portrayal of Kylo Ren\, Daisy Ridley is ok but the rest is underwhelming. Rose Tico and Holdo were horrible. The humour is corny and flat it feels forced. There is little character development\, if at all. I never thought I would hate a Star Wars film this much.
